casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Terrance L. JAMES. No. 536P00-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. Richard Slipsky, Assistant Attorney General, William C. Young, District Attorney, for State.

*501The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of August 2005 by Defendant to proceed without prepayment of fees and affidavit:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2005."
